Text.Page:
Bad news. I've deduced that Gourdo is probably still alive and no longer at the academy. He's more dangerous than ordinary spirits, isn't he?

Some advice: remember he can be placated. If you see him, try pumpkin pie. You can get it from major cities, and maybe the monsters have some as well.

Best not to question why Gourdo—a pumpkin—wants pumpkin pie. I shudder to think of the answer. But try giving him some pie...see what that does."Pie it is, then."
